name: Circle Click - click on time
description:
Circle Click is a simple hyper-casual game where the objective is to dodge red rectangles and collect green squares to gain points. For these points, you can buy skins and, in the future, new maps.

How to play:
    ● Touch the screen to prevent the ball from hitting obstacles
    ●  Get points to unlock new balls
    ● With each update, new Models and Levels appear

Try to survive as long as possible!
